content: This video showcases how he and his crew fish for scallops using a dredge, and shuck about 600 pounds of scallop meat before they reach the docks at the end of the day.
translations: ita:Questo video mostra come lui e il suo equipaggio pescano le capesante con una draga e sgusciano circa 270 chili di polpa
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Cangarejo (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
